localize.full_text: 200人以上のアフガン人通訳とその家族を乗せた最初の飛行機が米国に向けて出発し、大規模な避難活動が始まりました。https://t.co/XGke9eMOyC

previous.title: A Hong Kong protester who was the first to be charged under a national-security law imposed by Beijing was sentenced to nine years in prison https://t.co/1qB6ZESKVS
